import React from 'react' import './CSS/Technologies.css' import {Animated} from'react-animated-css' import { useState } from 'react' import Arrow from './CSS/img/arrow.png' import HTML5 from './CSS/img/html5.png' import CSS from './CSS/img/CSS.png' import JQuery from './CSS/img/jquery.png' import Python from './CSS/img/python.png' import Django from './CSS/img/django.png' import MySQL from './CSS/img/mysql.png' const Technologies = () => { const [display, setDipslay] = useState(false) const [animationSwitch1_3, setAnimationSwitch1_3] = useState(true) const [animationSwitch4_6, setAnimationSwitch4_6] = useState(false) const switchTech = () => { if(animationSwitch1_3){ setAnimationSwitch1_3(false) } else if(!animationSwitch1_3){ setAnimationSwitch1_3(true) } if(!animationSwitch4_6){ setAnimationSwitch4_6(true) } else if(animationSwitch4_6){ setAnimationSwitch4_6(false) } if(!display){ setDipslay(true) } else if(display){ setDipslay(false) } } return (
